title: Dynkin Diagrams of ${CP}^1$ Orbifolds
abstract: We investigate $N=2$ supersymmetric sigma model orbifolds of the sphere in the large radius limit. These correspond to $N=2$ superconformal field theories. Using the equations of topological-anti-topological fusion for the topological orbifold, we compute the generalized Dynkin diagrams of these theories - i.e., the soliton spectrum - which was used in the classification of massive superconformal theories. They correspond to the extended Dynkin diagrams associated to finite subgroups of $SO(3).$
